mapper.select: select documents.name as name, documents.doc_id as id, documents.creator_id as creatorid, documents.create_time as createtime, documents.modifier_id as modifierid, documents.self_auth as selfauth, documents.now_auth as nowauth, documents.is_editing as isediting from documents join document_collector on documents.doc_id = document_collector.doc_id and collector_id = #{param1}
